Data Fields
DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_HW_Resources_t Struct Reference
cfarcaProc DPU External » cfarcaProc DPU External Data Structures

Hardware resources used for CFARCA implemented using DSP. More...

#include <dpu/cfarcaproc/cfarcaprocdsp.h>

Data Fields

EDMA_Handle edmaHandle
 EDMA Handle.
 
DPEDMA_ChanCfg edmaInPing
 EDMA configuration for CFAR data In Ping.
 
DPEDMA_ChanCfg edmaInPong
 EDMA configuration for CFAR data In Pong.
 
DPIF_DetMatrix detMatrix
 Pointer to range/Doppler log2 magnitude detection matrix. The data buffer must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_DET_MATRIX_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
DPIF_CFARDetList * cfarRngDopSnrList
 Pointer to CFAR output list, must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_CFAR_DET_LIST_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t cfarRngDopSnrListSize
 Number of elements of type DPIF_cfarDetList of CFAR output list.
 
uint32_t * cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask
 Scratch memory for Doppler cfar detection bit mask. Must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_DOPPLER_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskSize
 Number of elements of type uint32_t of scratch memory for bit mask of Doppler cfar detections. Must be >= (numRangeBins * numDoppplerBins) / 32.
 
uint16_t * localDetMatrixBuffer
 Scratch buffer for detMatrix DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_DET_MATRIX_LOCAL_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t localDetMatrixBufferSize
 Local detection matrix buffer size, must be Max(numDopplerBins,numRangeBins) * sizeof(uint16_t) * 2.
 
uint16_t * cfarDetOutBuffer
 Scratch buffer for cfar detection output DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_DET_MATRIX_LOCAL_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t cfarDetOutBufferSize
 Scratch buffer size for cfar detection output, Max(numDopplerBins,numRangeBins) * sizeof(uint16_t)
 
uint16_t * cfarScrachBuffer
 Scratch buffer for Peak grouping DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_SCRACHBUF_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t cfarScrachBufferSize
 Scratch buffer size for cfar peak grouping. size = 4 * cfarRngDopSnrListSize * sizeof(uint16_t)
 

Detailed Description

Hardware resources used for CFARCA implemented using DSP.
